verses.text: \w A|strong="H5921"\w* \w PRAYER|strong="H8605"\w* \w OF|strong="H5921"\w* HABACUC \w THE|strong="H5921"\w* \w PROPHET|strong="H5030"\w* \w FOR|strong="H5921"\w* IGNORANCES.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thy \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w bring|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w*: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*: \w when|strong="H8085"\w* thou art angry, thou wilt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* south, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Pharan: \w His|strong="H0935"\w* \w glory|strong="H1935"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

\w His|strong="H1961"\w* \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*; \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: \w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* hid:

Death \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*. \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* devil \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0776"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* measured \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*. \w He|strong="H0776"\w* beheld, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* melted \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* \w were|strong="H0776"\w* crushed \w to|strong="H0776"\w* pieces. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w world|strong="H0776"\w* \w were|strong="H0776"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7817"\w* \w down|strong="H7817"\w* \w by|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* journeys \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w eternity|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Ethiopia \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Madian \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w troubled|strong="H7264"\w*.

Wast thou \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* thy indignation \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*? \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

Thou wilt surely take \w up|strong="H1234"\w* thy \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*: according \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w oaths|strong="H7621"\w* which thou hast spoken \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*. Thou wilt \w divide|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w were|strong="H2022"\w* grieved: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* great body \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1980"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H5975"\w* \w habitation|strong="H2073"\w*, \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w of|strong="H0216"\w* thy \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, they shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* \w of|strong="H0216"\w* thy \w glittering|strong="H1300"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* thou wilt tread \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* under foot: \w in|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* thou wilt astonish \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

Thou wentest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* thy Christ. Thou struckest \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: thou hast \w laid|strong="H6168"\w* \w bare|strong="H6168"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*.

Thou hast cursed \w his|strong="H0398"\w* sceptres, \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w his|strong="H0398"\w* warriors, \w them|strong="H0398"\w* \w that|strong="H4294"\w* came out \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* whirlwind \w to|strong="H4294"\w* \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* \w me|strong="H0398"\w*. \w Their|strong="H0398"\w* joy \w was|strong="H7218"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w that|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w him|strong="H0398"\w* \w that|strong="H4294"\w* devoureth \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w man|strong="H6041"\w* \w in|strong="H7218"\w* \w secret|strong="H4565"\w*.

Thou madest \w a|strong="H3220"\w* way \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H1869"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* thy \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H1869"\w* mud \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* bowels \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w troubled|strong="H7264"\w*: \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w trembled|strong="H7264"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*. \w Let|strong="H5117"\w* \w rottenness|strong="H7538"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* swarm \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*. \w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* tribulation: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H0935"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* girded.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* blossom: \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* spring \w in|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vines|strong="H1612"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* labour \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w fail|strong="H3584"\w*: \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fields|strong="H7709"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w yield|strong="H2981"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w food|strong="H0400"\w*: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H1504"\w* \w off|strong="H1504"\w* \w from|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fold|strong="H4356"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* \w in|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stalls|strong="H7517"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0589"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* Jesus.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \w is|strong="H0136"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*: \w and|strong="H2428"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0136"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w like|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* harts: \w and|strong="H2428"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* conqueror \w will|strong="H0136"\w* \w lead|strong="H1869"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* singing psalms.
